name: Adobe Reader
description: Adobe Reader is the free and trusted leader for reliably viewing and interacting with PDFs on your Android phone or tablet.

name: Adobe Photoshop Express
description: Snap. Edit. Share. Smile. Photo magic at your fingertips.

name: Adobe AIR
description: Adobe’s AIR technology has made it possible for developers around the world to create some of the most stunning apps and mobile games available today.

name: Adobe Lightroom mobile
description: Adobe Lightroom mobile is a companion app to Adobe Photoshop Lightroom 5.

name: Adobe Revel
description: Encourage family members to add their photos; and together you'll create a library rich in memories.

name: Adobe Connect
description: Adobe Connect users can host; join; collaborate; and share in Adobe Connect meetings; webinars; and training - for true collaboration and mobile learning from anywhere / anytime.

name: PhoneGap Developer
description: The PhoneGap Developer is a testing utility for web developers and designers using the PhoneGap framework.

name: Adobe Edge Inspect CC
description: Adobe Edge Inspect CC is for web designers and developers who are targeting mobile browsers.

name: CMO Magazine
description: CMO Magazine by Adobe delivers marketing insights; expertise and inspiration for and by marketing leaders.

name: DCO Connect Mobile
description: Host; attend; present and completely drive collaboration in DCO Connect meetings or training - anywhere; anytime; powered by Adobe® Connect Mobile.

name: Adobe EchoSign
description: Adobe EchoSign lets you e-sign documents; send documents to others for signature; track your documents and get e-signatures instantly with in-person signing.
